title: Cognitive Achievement and Technological Presence Enhancement in Online Project-Based Science Learning

context.additional_context: Environment where early-career professionals in medical/legal/technical fields collaborate using digital devices to solve real-life problem-solving projects

learning_goals: Learners can apply scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy through real-time interactions with peers/instructors on an online discussion platform.
Learners can submit project deliverables reflecting peer feedback at least twice a week using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace).
Learners can explain, through analysis of online learning activity logs, how their digital presence (login frequency, interaction count) correlates with cognitive achievement.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
